faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to your questions about Tokyo Sushi Bar
faq.schemaDescription: Frequently asked questions about Tokyo Sushi Bar - delivery, hours, halal options and more

delivery.question: Do you deliver? What is the delivery area?
delivery.answer: Yes, we deliver within a 5 km radius of our restaurant located at Rue de la Cathédrale 59, Liège. Delivery fees vary based on distance. You can check your address when placing an order.

hours.question: What are your opening hours?
hours.answer: We are open Monday to Friday from 12:00 to 14:30 and 18:00 to 22:30. Saturday and Sunday from 12:00 to 15:00 and 18:00 to 23:00. We are closed on Tuesdays.

halal.question: Do you offer halal options?
halal.answer: Yes! We offer a selection of halal dishes, clearly marked on our menu with the Halal icon. All our halal products are prepared according to Islamic standards.

discount.question: Is there a discount for pickup orders?
discount.answer: Yes! Enjoy 10% off on all discountable items when you choose the pickup option. The discount is automatically applied at checkout.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept online payment (credit/debit card) and cash payment on delivery or pickup. For online orders, payment is secure.

allergens.question: Do you have allergen information?
allergens.answer: Please inform us of any allergies or dietary restrictions in the order comments. Contact us directly at 04 222 98 88 for detailed allergen information about our dishes.

freshness.question: Is your fish fresh?
freshness.answer: Absolutely! Every morning, fresh fish is delivered directly to our restaurant and carefully prepared by our chef. We guarantee exceptional freshness and quality.

parking.question: Is there parking nearby?
parking.answer: Our restaurant is located in the center of Liège. There are several public parking lots nearby: Parking Cathédrale, Parking Opéra, and street parking spaces (paid).
